mapper.select: select goods_name as goodsName,sum(count) as count from r_order_detail as a left join r_order as b on a.order_id = b.order_id inner join r_goods as e on a.goods_id = e.goods_id where date_sub(curdate(), interval #{day} day) <= date(b.create_time) and a.del=0 GROUP BY goods_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 0,#{number}

select f.category_id,category_name as categoryName,sum(count) as count from r_order_detail as a left join r_order as b on a.order_id = b.order_id inner join r_goods as e on a.goods_id = e.goods_id inner join r_category as f on e.category_id = f.category_id where date_sub(curdate(), interval #{day} day) <= date(b.create_time) and a.del=0 GROUP BY category_name

select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%m-%d') as date,count(*) as count from r_member where date_sub(curdate(), interval #{day} day) <= date(create_time) and del=0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
select mc_name as categoryName,count(*) as count from r_member as a inner join r_merber_category as b on a.mc_id = b.mc_id where a.del=0 GROUP BY b.mc_id

SELECT dayHour,IF(count IS NULL, 0, count) as count FROM (SELECT SUM(people_num) AS count,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%H')AS hour FROM r_order where DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() GROUP BY hour ORDER BY 1) A RIGHT JOIN (SELECT one.hours + two.hours AS dayHour FROM (SELECT 0 hours UNION ALL SELECT 1 hours UNION ALL SELECT 2 hours UNION ALL SELECT 3 hours UNION ALL SELECT 4 hours UNION ALL SELECT 5 hours UNION ALL SELECT 6 hours UNION ALL SELECT 7 hours UNION ALL SELECT 8 hours UNION ALL SELECT 9 hours) one CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 hours UNION ALL SELECT 10 hours UNION ALL SELECT 20 hours) two WHERE (one.hours + two.hours) < 24 and(one.hours + two.hours)>= 7) B ON A.hour = CONVERT(B.dayHour, SIGNED) ORDER BY dayHour
